author: alexander.huber@kurier.at (Alexander Huber)
articleTitle: Wenig Risiko am Transfer-Karussell: Rapid hält den Sparkurs
articleTitleTranslated: Little risk at the transfer carousel: Rapid keeps the austerity course
articleContent: SALZBURG – Zugänge: Aaronson (Philadelphia), Bernardo (Brighton/Leihe),  Mantl (Unterhaching), Zikovic (Istra). Abgänge: Onguéné (Genoa), Szoboszlai (Leipzig), Ashimeru (Anderlecht/Leihe), Okugawa (Bielefeld/Leihe), Tetteh (SKN/Leihe).

RAPID – Zu: keine. Ab: Ibrahimoglu (Heracles Almelo). STURM – Zu: Yeboah (WSG Tirol). Ab: Eze (Ankara), T. Koch (Lafnitz/Leihe). LASK – Zu: Succar (Municipal/Peru), Altunbas (Eskisehirspor), Griger (Michalovce); alle bei OÖ Juniors im Einsatz.

Ab: Cheberko (Osijek/Leihe), Haudum (Altach). WSG TIROL – Zu: keine. Ab: Yeboah (Sturm Graz). WAC – Zu: Henriksson (Elfsborg), Röcher (Ingolstadt).  Ab: Schmerböck (Hartberg). AUSTRIA – Zu: Poulsen (Gladbach/Leihe), Djuricin (Karlsruhe), Zeka (Mouscron),  Martel (Leipzig/Leihe).

Ab: Turgeman (H. Haifa), Sax (Admira), Edomwonyi (Atromitos/Leihe). SKN – Zu: Tursch (BW Linz), Tetteh (Salzburg/Leihe), Strasser (Hertha Wels). Ab: Messerer (Horn/Leihe), Grozurek (Batumi/GEO). HARTBERG – Zu: Schmerböck (WAC), Flecker (Würzburg), Horvat (Kapfenberg).

Ab: Gabbichler (GAK), Fadinger (Lafnitz/Leihe). RIED – Zu: Möschl (vereinslos), P. Schmidt (Barnsley/Leihe), Stosic (Liefering). Ab: Ammerer, Grubeck (beide Amstetten), Canillas. ALTACH – Zu: Subotic (vereinslos), Haudum (LASK), Bukta (Liefering),  Carando (Cusco FC/Peru).

Ab: Pangop. ADMIRA –  Zu: Sax (Austria), Datkovic (Kisvarda),  Atanga (Kiel), Ostrzolek, Wooten (beide vereinslos).  Ab: Hjulmand (Lecce), Maierhofer (Würzburg), Pejovic (Zagreb), Cirkovic (Sabac/Leihe).
articleContentTranslated: SALZBURG - Additions: Aaronson (Philadelphia), Bernardo (Brighton / loan), Mantl (Unterhaching), Zikovic (Istra). Departures: Onguéné (Genoa), Szoboszlai (Leipzig), Ashimeru (Anderlecht / loan), Okugawa (Bielefeld / loan), Tetteh (SKN / loan).

RAPID - To: none. From: Ibrahimoglu (Heracles Almelo). STURM - To: Yeboah (WSG Tirol). From: Eze (Ankara), T. Koch (Lafnitz / Leihe). LASK - To: Succar (Municipal / Peru), Altunbas (Eskisehirspor), Griger (Michalovce); all in action at OÖ Juniors.

From: Cheberko (Osijek / Leihe), Haudum (Altach). WSG TIROL - To: none. From: Yeboah (Sturm Graz). WAC - To: Henriksson (Elfsborg), Röcher (Ingolstadt). From: Schmerböck (Hartberg). AUSTRIA - To: Poulsen (Gladbach / loan), Djuricin (Karlsruhe), Zeka (Mouscron), Martel (Leipzig / loan).

From: Turgeman (H. Haifa), Sax (Admira), Edomwonyi (Atromitos / loan). SKN - To: Tursch (BW Linz), Tetteh (Salzburg / loan), Strasser (Hertha Wels). From: Messerer (Horn / Leihe), Grozurek (Batumi / GEO). HARTBERG - To: Schmerböck (WAC), Flecker (Würzburg), Horvat (Kapfenberg).

From: Gabbichler (GAK), Fadinger (Lafnitz / Leihe). RIED - To: Möschl (without association), P. Schmidt (Barnsley / Leihe), Stosic (Liefering). From: Ammerer, Grubeck (both Amstetten), Canillas. ALTACH - To: Subotic (without a club), Haudum (LASK), Bukta (Liefering), Carando (Cusco FC / Peru).

From: Pangop. ADMIRA - To: Sax (Austria), Datkovic (Kisvarda), Atanga (Kiel), Ostrzolek, Wooten (both without a club). From: Hjulmand (Lecce), Maierhofer (Würzburg), Pejovic (Zagreb), Cirkovic (Sabac / Leihe).
